summary: Based on the fascinating true-life story of Michael Glatze, a gay activist who becomes a Christian pastor after identifying as a heterosexual.
cast: James Franco|Zachary Quinto|Emma Roberts|Charlie Carver|Avan Jogia|Daryl Hannah|Lesley Ann Warren|Jefferson Mays|Jan Maxwell|Ahna O'Reilly|Nick Rehberger|Leven Rambin|Kevin Cahoon|Blake Lee|Jacob Loeb|Daniel Polo|Evie Thompson|Devon Graye|Deidre Goodwin|Blake Young-Fountain|Vince Jolivette|Jenna Leigh Green|Amelia Campbell|Patrick Page|Lance Roberts|Eva Augustina Sinotte|Juan Castano|Kanoa Goo|Anna Myrha|Joseph Baken|Jaime Cepero|Ruthie Ann Miles|Raymond T. Williams|Sophie Savides|Ella Dershowitz|Reema Sampat|Anna Suzuki|Anni Weisband|Patrick John Fagan|Allie Gallerani|Laura Ling|Abby|Ollie|John Lobato|Chosen Wilkins|Alan Avitan|Nicole Chessin|Steve Fleming|Heather Soellner
title: I Am Michael
